title: Impact of Basic Sanitation Services on Malaria

and: isValid(datum['People using at least basic sanitation services (% of population)'])
isValid(datum['Incidence of malaria (per 1,000 population at risk)'])

x.field: People using at least basic sanitation services (% of population)
x.title: Percentage of Population with Basic Sanitation Services

y.field: Incidence of malaria (per 1,000 population at risk)
y.title: Malaria Incidence (per 1,000 population at risk)
